metadata.title: CVE-2020-20896 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in function latm_write_packet in libavformat/latmenc.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts due to a Null pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
